name: Goo Goo (itch)
description:
Fling a ball of goo around and find stars. It's pretty simple.
Let's have fun!

FEATURES:

  • Stuff it can stick to!
  • Stuff it can bounce on!
  • Fun gravity stuff!
  • Open world!
  • Secrets out the wazoo ;)
  • Music & sound by Reckless
  • All the sounds were made with his mouth (!!!)
